Yup, on the trip to Hanoi, we even tried Mc Donald ğŸ˜— We chose the most famous stuffs there like Cheeseburger, McNuggets and McFlurry, with some other stuffs like fried chicken, fries.
We're so surprised, cuz... they weren't that good! ğŸ˜³ The Burger was so bland, dry beef patty, didn't even taste like beef, with a silce of cheese, some sauce, done. Same with the nuggets, too normal to be something ğŸ˜” The nice thing in here that we love the most was they have 5 kinds of sauce, not just ketchup and chilli sauce, they even have mayonnaise, garlic chilli sauce and honey mustard ğŸ˜
But the McFlurry was really good, best ice cream in all of the fasfood franchises for us.
The fried chicken was nice. Good fries, we got them from a new batch, so they were even hot and crunchy ğŸ˜š They have cakes too but we didn't try.
In general, it was a lil bit sad, like there are a lot of people that addicted to these stuffs so we really had high expectation... ğŸ˜”
